responses: 0: No national level quota for any social group.
1: Yes, there are reserved seats for at least one social group.
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding. The resulting data has not gone through full quality control with thorough cross-referencing yet. V-Dem Country Coordinators answers were used for country-years where data was missing in CCP (Elkins et al. 2012).
question: Is there a national-level quota for any social groups in the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature?
name: v2lgqumin
